website_summaries.verdict: When you need to look good in the photos, you need these shoes. These stiletto sandals are favorites from Schutz when it comes to weddings and other formal affairs.
pros: Stable and comfortable for a heel this high
Comes in black and nude colors at Zappos
Comes in six colors on Amazon
Fine ankle strap with buckle closure

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Heels
customer_reviews.text: These are FABULOUS!! Perfect denim color, very comfortable fit. I normally wear a 7 but I did size up to a 7.5 due other reviews and I'm glad I did my toes are not being crushed by the band. The ankle strap also fits well I plan on ordering more of this style in different colors
customer_reviews.author: yvette052977

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful high quality shoes for narrow feet! Unfortunately my feet are too wide for these shoes :-(
customer_reviews.author: Tolan

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: beautiful shoe!! definitely my fav shoe purchase this summer. after the first wear, realized I needed the gel pad for the ball of my foot, personal preference. ordered my regular size, and they fit perfectly. I'm 5'10, with these I'm well over 6'. they definitely turn heads.
customer_reviews.author: Denver area

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, classy shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and comfortable. I ordered a half size up, due to reading reviews, and I completely regret it. Unless you have wide feet and big toes, I wouldn’t suggest sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Branka Miskovic

customer_reviews.title: Strap in front is so wide and get slide to the ground
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed and sad. The strap on front is so wide and my feet keep sliding. The size is perfect, I even bought a half size smaller. I was really hoping they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Gorges

customer_reviews.title: Timeless sex appeal
customer_reviews.text: Ultra sexy. This shoe is a classic and will never go out of fashion, There is no way that these will ever be comfortable so I'm not sure why anyone would have that expectation. They are meant for short walks from car to venue and back. Just for profiling! Highly recommended value version of the Stuart Weitzman nude sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Thinkhunni

customer_reviews.title: It’s average
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half a size up. It’s okay, I guess. Doesn’t strike me as a stunner but okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Brown

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: The toe area is a little tight, even though I bough a half size up My toes are wider than my heel. So, I used a shoe stretcher. Amazingly comfortable even at this height. I'd buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: nope. not yet.

customer_reviews.title: loved them until I put them on b/c the toe ...
customer_reviews.text: loved them until I put them on b/c the toe bed is very narrow which sucks b/c I really wanted to keep these. I even tried to size up but they were too big and the toe bed was still too narrow. Not interested in walking around w/ "model toes" where they hang off the side
customer_reviews.author: LadyTJ12

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe. Not the most comfy and runs half size small. Wore them for my wedding. They are definitely a quality sexy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Matu810

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe, definitely my go to
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe, definitely my go to! This shoe matches everything and really elongates the leg. Order a half size up as this shoe runs a half size small. I can wear these shoes all night with no problem, for extra comfort I added some small foot petals to the insole and it helped with awkward toe bunch that can happen at times as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S

customer_reviews.title: these are best suited for narrower feet and run about a half ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, these are best suited for narrower feet and run about a half size small. I ordered the oyster color. These are beautiful, versatile shoes, but the ankle strap left me blistered and bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: sew

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWOOD is  PATENT LEATHER not regular leather
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the Lightwood color being made of regular leather, when indeed they are patent leather. I wish I read the other reviews as someone noted this. Totally bummed. I have these shoes in other colors , and the shiny leather is nowhere near as nice, and is much harder/ less comfortable. Also they run half size small, as do most Schutz. I am normally a 7 and always buy a 7.5 in this brand, from pumps to boots.
customer_reviews.author: flexiest

customer_reviews.title: Denim dream ....
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great I love the denim color the heel is very sturdy. Well made heels the strap around the ankle is very attractive. The heel is not to high these are quite comfortable there is a some cushion in the foot bed.
customer_reviews.author: SedericksWife

customer_reviews.title: but not very comfortable after a couple hours of wear
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe, but not very comfortable after a couple hours of wear. The ankle strap digs in quite a bit as well, but I'm willing to put up with the discomfort because it's such a beautiful shoe that goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Ali_Lei

customer_reviews.title: love the fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 7 ordered a 7.5 fit perfectly. Picture neutral is not the color. It's more beige sand.love the fit. Most comfortable shoe on ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, but the lightwood is patent leather--the picture shows regular leather so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Deerin

customer_reviews.title: There are beautiful! They look so elegant on
customer_reviews.text: There are beautiful! They look so elegant on. Only complaint, as mentioned by others, is there is not stretch to the ankle strap. It can feel a bit restrictive. Definitely not a deal breaker, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful heels and surprisingly comfy! The quality is top notch. I want these in every color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna P.

customer_reviews.title: If you can overlook these issues the shoe is very beautiful unfortunately I had to return
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were extremely uncomfortable and felt wobbly, I think it is because of the hight. The arch also is not designed well so the center of my foot could not rest on the shoe. If you can overlook these issues the shoe is very beautiful unfortunately I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Armelle M. Karimi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: feet kept sliding and rubbed against my toes and back of my feet after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Schutz do run small, so I always order half a size bigger . That usually does the trick for me!
customer_reviews.author: D.Grim

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love love love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My new fav. I absolutely love love love these shoes. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe and true to size but toe box is ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe and true to size but toe box is for a very narrow foot. The side of my foot extended beyond the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Jones

customer_reviews.title: I loved them until this pair that after wearing it for ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s my fourth pair Of shoes, I loved them until this pair that after wearing it for 30 minutes, it burning over my heel and causing a huge blister.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: High quality! More comfortable than Stuart's!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes! High quality! I wear them everyday to work and I see that they are very comfortable! I call them my work shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Narrow in the toes. Would have needed to remove my pinky toe to make these work.
customer_reviews.author: pasadena201

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong shoe style
customer_reviews.text: A star was required so I choose one but VERY disappointed I ordered these shoes and received A DIFFERENT PAIR Saasha Lee neutral color 👎
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loves the shoe but it fit very snug. I don't have a wide foot so very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes - The width is perfect and the ankle strap isn't toooo small
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoes - The width is perfect and the ankle strap isn't toooo small; however, I ordered neutral and the color is not the shade of brown pictured. Much more grayish-neutral, but still beautiful. Also, I wore them for about an hour to run errands and seriously had to return home before everything was done because the back of my ankles had blistered so badly...even on the loosest notch. I'd definitely recommend wearing a couple band-aids back there the first few times. Other than that, the shoe wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. Perfect fit. True to size! Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: TeeKayEss

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look very nice, but runs somewhat narrow and small. Order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnice

customer_reviews.title: I’m absolutely glad of purchasing this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely glad of purchasing this shoes , they look gorgeous , and I advice to get half size up , for those who has wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Bahar

customer_reviews.title: The color of shoes didn't match on the picture
customer_reviews.text: When I got shoes, the color didn't the same as shoes show above on the picture. When I got shoes, it was more like light tan color. They didn't look good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Daniels

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM!!! I have narrow feets so Im glad I didnt went half size up, they fit me perfect. Love the heel as well. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Keron

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how perfect the denim of this shoe is
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how perfect the denim of this shoe is! Absolutely fabulous, perfect spring/summer weather sandals to wear with dresses, skirts or jeans! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these shoes. I have 5 colors and plan on buying more. Just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love love love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. My only complaint would be that they can be a little slippery when you walk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy second pair
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Very Well made and incredibly beautiful . Would love to have a few more pairs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janeleey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are true to size and very sexy. They are not the kind of shoes to wear all day but you may get 3 to 4 hours before your feet begin to hurt. You know the saying " you must suffer a little for fashion " but these shoes are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. Plan on buying more of this brand. However based on a prior review I bought a half size bigger. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is beautiful. A gorgeous neutral. The ankle strap doesn't provide any support.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not the most comfortable after standing for over 3 hours, but they look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Di Pierro

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes , but you have to buy half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍 I love them. However I thought they would have been ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so sexy on! 😍😍 I love them. However I thought they would have been darker. It's ok I make it werkkkkk!
customer_reviews.author: K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love the color (wood), but the foot bed is narrow. I think I have normal size feet, so surprised at how narrow it was. I am returning for that purpose. Very well made shoes, other than that.
customer_reviews.author: martm

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Beautifullllll! I love these ! They fit perfectly. I thought (for some reason) the heel was higher. They come with a shoe bag -yay!
customer_reviews.author: N F Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes but looked awful on my feet. I have slightly wider feet, but I can usually fit into normal shoes. My toes were squished in front strap and made it very hard to walk.
customer_reviews.author: ckdesign

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Moderate comfort level-expected given height of heel
customer_reviews.author: Maya Mathew

product_meta.title: SCHUTZ Women's Cadey-Lee High Heel Dress Sandal
product_meta.description: Open toe dress sandal featuring slender toe strap and adjustable ankle strap
